No sad chicken breast covered w/ some salty sauce w/ potatos here...no, we're talking bbq ckn, salmon, mahi mahi, fresh salads, grains, whole wheat rolls...really good for meetings/conferences. NW ingredients (apples, fish, nuts, etc.) Overall - a great place for meetings or stopovers...no swimming pool, but assume that might be to keep kids away? Since it has a theme of business meetings there...quiet at night...

Reviews.Title: “(Almost) Plenty of Bang for (not too much of the) Buck!”
Reviews.Author: desertdenizen
Reviews.Content: Previous reviews were spot on. Kudos to Lorie and Ian at the front desk! More concierge training for others needed, however! Free shuttle to Sea-Tac and light rail into town is very handy! Great environment! (See their website!) Restful plus! Someone here really knows fine dining but they need to work on how it is finally delivered to the guests. My evening meal was at the bar which is way to small to have a pool table crammed in the center of it! I got cracked in the ribs by the pool cue of one player while I was eating at the bar, which sent one inebriated female of a certain age into loud whoops of laughter. (Nothing like being laughed at while trying to enjoy dinner.) The bartender was a bit atitude-y as well. Food was ok but as often is the case, the menu hyperbole outshone the finished product. My companion's dungeness crab sandwich was by his estimate excessively oily, and my BLT made with pork belly was not as good as I expected. The complementary continental breakfast was wonderful - with (peeled) hard boiled eggs, smoked salmon with capers, , bagels, and a great blueberry pastry among other great choices. The comment earlier about food not appropriate for children was groundless. There was even oatmeal, for heaven sake! Lunch al fresco on the lovely terrace area the next day was some bettter, but service was maddeningly slow. My friend's Caesar salad presented only a few greens, with the parmesan regiano, the chicken, and anchovies just sort of dumped into this enormous bowl. It looked very unappetizing. My burger however was excellent, though there were no salt or pepper shakers in evidence and requests took over 10 minutes to be heeded. Many guests were curious about what we presumed to be big jars of sun tea sitting on the terrace. Mid-meal, I asked our (overly) officious server who grandly announced that, yes, it was indeed sun-tea and it was a gratis service. He however had failed to mention that when he took our beverage orders. My request for him to leave the (elegant) water pitcher on the tabel was agreed to after the obligitory caveat of "Well, we don't normally do that...but...") The tea was delicious and they should've put little announcements letting the guests know about it. Chocolate banana bread pudding was somewhat bland. The nice free youghurt or ice cream in the living areas would've been better.Tip! BYO soft drinks to go with the free water! ! Otherwise it's the berries (straw-,blue-, and otherwise!)!

Reviews.Title: “A little piece of heaven”
Reviews.Author: AmyQ116
Reviews.Content: We were fortunate enough to stumble upon this place with a Hotwire purchase, this is hands down the best value hotel we've ever stayed in. You immediately feel like you're at a luxurious spa with both the rooms, the grounds and the restaurant. Robes in the rooms, a big giant bathtub, beautiful picture windows and even complimentary snacks nearby! If we're back in the Seattle area, forget Hotwire, we're staying here. It's a quick 15 mile drive to downtown, easy access.

Reviews.Title: “Best hidden value at SeaTac”
Reviews.Author: sarasota-traveler
Reviews.Content: Great value and great staff. Best of choice at SeaTac.................

Reviews.Title: “Love, love, LOVE this place!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DivingGurl
Reviews.Content: After hours and hours of travel and a week spent with family....this was the last night of our vacation. We needed a hotel close to the airport and our brother-in-law suggested this place. OMG....I did NOT want to leave. It was gorgeous.....and VERY close to the airport. Everything about it was perfect....from black out shades, to robes, to the perfect bed & pillows, to hip & modern decor, to an incredibly appointed bathroom, to Starbucks coffee, etc! Seriously.....I am a world traveler and this is an incredible price for what is offered. The complimentary breakfast went above and beyond. Just a very cool place....I want to come back to Seattle just to stay here, and my husband and daughter agree!

Reviews.Title: “Gem of a hotel in the midst of Seattle”
Reviews.Author: Itsya36
Reviews.Content: Cedar Brook Lodge located just near the Sea Tac, Seattle Washington airport was so serene, exuding solace and peace unexpectedly because of the gorgeous environs of trees, small streams, a wetlands preserve and the decor of the lodge itself. The hotel had been a WAMU training center so it had every amenity a weary traveler could ask for as well as a world class Chef. Excellently done, staff was super and the shuttle bus service to the Airport or the new local train into the city was comfortable and on time. Internet Wifi perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing quality and value”
Reviews.Author: AnneMarie062
Reviews.Content: This airport location seems more like a destination resort. Its extensive grounds are beautiful, and the rooms are spacious and well-decorated. The food was excellent and reasonably priced, and the free breakfast buffet was high-quality and with a wide selection. Free ice cream and other snacks was an unexpected treat. The price was about one-half of what one would expect for accommodations of this quality. Don't pass this one up.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ogg023
Reviews.Content: I stop in Seattle for one night on my way to Hawaii I booked this hotel with hot wire..Great website..I got a great price for this luxrious and it was 10 minutes from the airport..PERFECT. They pick me up in a nice Red car .They treat me like a VIP went to my room beautiful with a great view of the park surrounded this hotel ,,The bathroom had a big soak bath with bath salt and they have bathrobes..Each floor has a living room with free snacks, fruits ,cheese, water bottles , tea and coffee.. They had book shelves fill with great booksI did order room serive for dnner the food was good and delivery in a short time. In the morning they have continental breakfast, boiled eggs ,cold cuts ,fruits, juice, pastries, salmon, crossants .teas and coffee and more... I had a great evening and night , They drove me to the airport the next morning I was rested and ready to go to my flt to Paradise,

Reviews.Title: “BEST BANG FORTHE BUCK”
Reviews.Author: sunrich
Reviews.Content: saved $$$$$$ on the location vs downtown. free shuttle to light rail and a quick 20 min (safe ride) to South lake center, hotel has free parking, breakfast,and a great staff ...24hour snacks available at each complex..... great value for families !

Reviews.Title: “Lives up to the reviews”
Reviews.Author: rm_blizzard
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook Lodge has astonishingly good reviews on TripAdvisor, and for good reason. Staying over on a weekend night we got a great rate and, for the money, the hotel was exceptional value. The grounds are immaculately maintained and parklike. It's within sight of SeaTac airport (only a couple of blocks away) yet a very peaceful and tranquil setting. The architecture has a contemporary west coast feel; nothing spectacular but definitely nicer than the ubiquitous blandness of most places in this category of hotel. The free snacks are a great bonus - all of very good quality. Breakfast is also worth mentioning - very good; but not quite as great as we recently had at the Hotel Sierra Bellevue. Overall I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Get-Away”
Reviews.Author: Dave914
Reviews.Content: If I was searching for a place where I could relax, be surprised and enjoy without the risk...this would be it. My only caution is not to eat too much and beds are semi firm it that matters to you. Great staff...shuttle to light rail and area. Rent a car only if you need to!

Reviews.Title: “Terrific”
Reviews.Author: bkerswill
Reviews.Content: Loved my room, loved the grounds, loved the extras such as the free chips, yogurt, fruit, water and chocolate!! Also, the free continental breakfast was quite tastey. Great coffee and juice. And, best of all, the rooms have windows that actually open! Bathrooms are great too! I would absolutely recommend the Cedarbrook Lodge to friends and business colleagues.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel with perfect surroundings!”
Reviews.Author: WineFanPNW
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed for two days at the Cedarbrook Lodge in Seatac/Tukwilla area; a Fri/Sat combo. We looked at this particular hotel initially because they were associated with the Rock-n-Roll marathon but we picked them for many other reasons. First, the pictures and the website are dead on. The place was beautiful! We stayed in a double queen bed room and it was huge. The set up of the room was perfect, with a long desk along the front wall. There were two closets, and built in cabinet where the TV was kept. Right next to the oversize windows, they had a lounge chair and table. The bathroom was large and very clean. I believe there are three different "lodges" and each building has an individual "family room" type area. While the individual rooms don't have refrigerators (which is something I normally need to have); you are encouraged to use the large one in this family room. And there are FREE snacks~~~ three different types of malt balls, string cheese, yogurt, and Hagen Diaz ice cream. I admit that we definitely helped ourselves to these on a daily basis. Our booking deal came with a credit to the restaurant, Copper Leaf. We liked the seasonal menu and came back both nights. I recently finished culinary school and was really impressed with the food we received. I especially liked the presentation of their butter with the sea salt sprinkled down the middle. I had the most tender and light gnocchi/ fava bean dish ever. Initially the price can seem steep but everything we had seemed to be very worth the price, except maybe the soup, which was tasty but nothing overly special. We ate outside both nights and really enjoyed the setting. Another bonus was that we could just add the bill to the room charges, no questions asked. Nice and convenient. We walked the grounds and found what looked like very well tended herb gardens. We also took a walk through the greenbelt that circles the property. Everything was quiet and peaceful. I was really surprised at how close we were to the airport but how little of the noise we heard. And I liked that we could see the planes take off from our room, like they were in our backyard! And let me not forget the staff! From the minute I called to ask questions about the hotel to the minute we left, we were impressed. Everyone was not only nice but KNOWLEDGEABLE! It was such a nice change to have a staff that seriously knew what was going on and could answer questions correctly. Helpful and courteous every step of the way. Thank you!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, friendly and a great value!”
Reviews.Author: sunshine77654
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel because I was running in a local race. They offered an early morning breakfast and shuttle for participants that really made a positive impact on my race day experience. The hotel grounds are beautiful and the large windows in the rooms made it easy to appreciate the beauty. The room itself was very cozy and clean. I would suggest this hotel to anyone needing lodging in the area or just wanting a nice getaway. Great experience!

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret in the Seattle/Tacoma area”
Reviews.Author: Maureen_in_Oly
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook is one of those best kept secrets in the SeaTac area. Formerly the conference center for WAMU, it is now owned by the Wright family - the folks who own the Space Needle. Only a mile or so from SeaTac airport, Cedarbrook offers a tranquil, upscale enviornment - you would never suspect you are near an airport. The sleeping rooms are large and comfortable. The conference space is very professional and comes in a variety of options for space - from an auditorium to small "dens". The food is fantastic and there is lots of it. The new bistro resturant is in front of the fireplace and is a nice intimate place for dinner and features fresh northwest foods. Breakfast and Lunch are served in their larger space and includes well stocked buffets. Living rooms in the sleeping room area feature a kitchette with a fridge stocked with water, yogurt, string cheese, etc. and a freezer full of individual sized hagen-das. Probably the best thing about the place, though, is the staff, which are welcoming, professional and wonderful to work with. There is also a small bar and a nice fitness room. Obviously, I can't say enough nice things about this place. We use them often for our trainings, but it is also a nice place to stay for someone visiting the area for fun.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Runner91
Reviews.Content: We were very surprised at the understated elegance. The room was very comfortable. We loved the full-sized bathroom and soaking tub. We did not hear the planes even though we were right at the airport. The grounds are beautiful. We would love to stay at the lodge again.

Reviews.Title: “I wish there is a Cedarbrook Lodge in every city I travel to!”
Reviews.Author: JYYL
Reviews.Content: The lodge is everything its website says it is and better!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel and gorgeous grounds”
Reviews.Author: PenalinasMom
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel on Expedia.com. It was wonderful! Only 5 minutes away from the airport, but you would never know it. The grounds were gorgeous,surrounded by trees, lawns, ponds, relaxing waters... Room was clean and comfortable. Bath was great in their huge tub. Their shuttle takes you to the new light rail system which runs to Pike's Market and Malls. Staff was courteous, friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good. Great dinner menu. Free snacks of candy, chips, yogurt, ice cream and bottled water available in common area 24/7. Can't wait to return. I have already recommended this hotel to several of my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful location, fantastic food, and fun amenities”
Reviews.Author: browyncats
Reviews.Content: The Cedarbrook Lodge is well-appointed, comfortable, in a beautiful setting. The food was excellent, with lots of unusual dishes, healthy salads, good desserts, nice wine selections. I loved the snacks available throughout--monster malted milkballs (including mint), yogurt, fruit, and water in refrigerators near the rooms, and Haagen-Dasz ice cream cups for that midnight snack. I stayed as part of a business group but would not hesitate to go back as a guest not on a business trip.

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: GilliganGirl
Reviews.Content: We had an early flight out and wanted a place to stay near SEATAC. We were pleasantly surprised to find the Cedarbrook Lodge - it's a great little hideaway. The hotel ground has so much ambiance - we felt safe and had a good's night rest. It's just as they advertise on their website - clean, well-maintained, and friendly staff. I'd stay here again if I'm ever back in the Seattle area.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a great find.”
Reviews.Author: Lucyck
Reviews.Content: Although this hotel is close to SeaTac Airport , it doesn't feel like an airport hotel. The grounds are pleasant and it is very quiet. The restaurant staff was very pleasant and helpful. We only stayed one night but we would certainly try this hotel again and would recommend to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent facility with great amenities.”
Reviews.Author: Don3245
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel close to Sea-Tac. Courtesy shuttle but if you must you can catch a cab for $6.00! Great staff and really beautiful decor. An excellent choice if staying in the area.

Reviews.Title: “I want to go back!!”
Reviews.Author: Lcrich56
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the night before we had to fly home after traveling to Vancouver for a wedding. What a great way to end the trip. This hotel really knows customer service. They upgraded us to a corner suite for our anniversary. Beautiful grounds. We had a light dinner in the almost empty restaurant and it was good. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, I am thoroughly impressed!!!”
Reviews.Author: EarthSpinner
Reviews.Content: Wow, wow. I found this hotel through Tripadvisor and read the reviews before the arrival. I wasn't sure what hotels deserved 5 stars. This one does. It's not a luxury hotel but it's an amazing value. This used to be some sort of retreat/meeting center for now bankrupt WAMU and it's now a part of independently owned boutique lodging. My room had two queen beds on the ground floor. All of the buildings were 3-story tall and lots of greenery to make you feel like you're in a forest somewhere even though you're only 5 minutes away from the airport. The interior of the room is very business-like, probably owing to its original mission. Downtown Seattle is maybe 15 mins drive. If you don't have to stay in downtown, this is the place to stay. I also stayed in the Westin Seattle during the same trip. Only reason I would stay in Westin over this is that I appreciated the walking distance to the waterfront and Pike Market. But you have to pay the exorbitant parking and Westin is more expensive. In addition, at Cedarbrook, you receive free WiFi, bottle water, ice cream, breakfast, etc. It's simple "Amazing"! Pros: Clean Shower/Bathroom, lots of desk space, free WiFI, free Haagen-Dazs cupsize ice cream and bottle water, free (and good) continental breakfast, free parking, nice greenery on the property Cons: None

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional”
Reviews.Author: mamadeer
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT place to stay! Whether you're here for business or pleasure you will not be disappointed with your stay!!! I was thrilled to have chosen the Cedarbrook Lodge for my visit to the Seattle area! This place is a Gem! Excellent! Excellent! Excellent!

Reviews.Title: “Stellar experience.....will only stay at Cedarbrook Lodge when in Seattle!”
Reviews.Author: DavidStreets
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook Lodge was a great experience....beautiful, spacious, excellent staff, shuttle, restaurant was very good, beautiful location and setting. Highly suggest staying here when in Seattle!!! AAA+

Reviews.Title: “Wot a delight”
Reviews.Author: krttering
Reviews.Content: We stop hear strait from the airport after a 9 1/2 hour flight from London, And wot a delight all the staff could not have been nicer. I would not hesitate to stay here again if we come back to Seattle.

Reviews.Title: “Just loved this lodge!!”
Reviews.Author: HeribertoHernandezJr
Reviews.Content: At first I was concerned that the distance from Downtown Seattle would be a negative point, but that was soon dismissed. The staff was incredibly helpful and cordial, the complimentary snacks in the kitchen were a big plus, the complimentary on-site parking beat out the $30/nightly or so that downtown hotels were charging, and the complimentary shuttle made getting around locally a breeze. I could go on and on, but let's just say that my girlfriend and I would not hesitate to stay here again on our next Seattle visit.

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular”
Reviews.Author: grooveo
Reviews.Content: I just can't say enough about Cedarbrook. From the moment I was picked up by the shuttle, to the moment I was dropped off, the staff just could not have been any nicer. The room was spotless and the grounds were beautiful. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: “This is gem near the Sea Tac airport; the room and conveniences were fantastic.”
Reviews.Author: lynnkendrick
Reviews.Content: This is the best moderately priced hotel room we have stayed in by far. We chose it based on hotel reviews of facilities near the airport since we were flying out the next morning. The room was beautifully furnished, immaculate and comfortable, and the grounds were wonderful. There was a comfortable furnished alcove down the hall with a refrigerator full of complimentary bottled water, yogurt and ice cream, and there were other snacks on the counter. A microwave is available. Would recommend this hotel to anyone who needs to stay in the Sea Tac area.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, wonderful amenities”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel19802010
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Cedarbrook Lodge and found it to be a great value. The location was excellent, so close to the airport yet none of the airport noise. This eco-friendly hotel was so relaxing with the tall trees and flowing streams. The staff was very knowlegable. We used the complimentary shuttle to take us to the light rail station then on to Pike Market. We definitely recommend this and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Markpdx
Reviews.Content: Wow what a great experience!! Tucked away close to the Seatac airport and just off the interstate. Easy to find. Quiet. Great service. Beautiful grounds. This hotel is a true find.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Jotade
Reviews.Content: Although my trip was for bussiness, I really enjoy the staying in CedarBrook. The customer Service is excellent and the food delicious, beautiful place to stay and very convinient near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Unforgettable most enjoyable experience in Seattle.”
Reviews.Author: rohitnina
Reviews.Content: Incredible courteous staff. Conveniently located near airport with free shuttle service. You do not need a car to go visit dwntown attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly charming and extremely beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: Celine W
Reviews.Content: I imagined it was going to be beautiful just by looking at pictures. I even did a quick drive through before I actually checked in but once I actually walked through the door, I realized that pictures did not even do the Cedarbrook lodge any justice. They also have living rooms in each off the buildings and they are fully stocked with chips, cookies, ice cream and water bottles. The rooms are fairly spacious and have a very clean and fresh scent. The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were some of the softest I've ever laid in. The bathroom was AMAZING with a huge soaking tub. My boyfriend and I are in a long distance relationship so staying in beautiful hotels for our weekend getaways is a thing that we have embedded into our relationship. I wanted our stay here in Seattle to be perfect and the Cedarbrook lodge is honestly one of the absolute best hotels we've ever stayed in during the past year and a half of our getaways.

Reviews.Title: “O...M...G...definitely a hidden treasure!”
Reviews.Author: kimg46
Reviews.Content: This hotel was awesome! Compared to the more well-known chains, this was much, much nicer! All the staff were friendly and helpful, the location/grounds are beautiful, and you'd never know you're literally 5 minutes from the airport! (I didn't believe that when I read it!) Great fitness room, the living rooms in each of the buildings are great, stocked with snacks and water for grabbing after a long day of sight-seeing. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Delightful!”
Reviews.Author: Eileenmichel
Reviews.Content: So close to the airport, yet so tucked away in beautiful nature setting. Rooms are spacious and elegant. Very eco-friendly. Staff is friendly and helpful. Great value. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel with lot's of extras and a serene relaxing environment”
Reviews.Author: michemania
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at Cedarbrook Lodge for a business event and was completely amazed by this hotel. It is beautifully landscaped with running streams and a secluded surrounding of trees. My room was gorgeous with a big window looking out at nature and a nice comfortable bed and small sitting area. The food was great and the service was beyond my expectations. It was very clean and well taken care of. It was a wonderful experience that I will definitely do again.

Reviews.Title: “Best place I've ever stayed--absolutely wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Meredith01
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook has beautiful grounds, a business center, gym, snacks in the lobby area for free (bottled water, string cheese, yogurt, haagen daz individual ice cream snacks, chocolate malt balls, etc), an amazing continental breakfast (that is much more than continental) and excellent customer service. We loved every minute of our stay. We wish we could live there! :)

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful secret hideaway”
Reviews.Author: nwdad
Reviews.Content: My wife and I found this unexpected oasis and will definitely return. The grounds are beautiful and you do not feel like you are near a big city. It is quiet and peaceful. The amenities are great - little things like free fruit and treats in each building and honestly the best free hotel breakfast I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: “The Best!”
Reviews.Author: kslbel
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook is absoulutely the finest place to stay for business or pleasure. I have stayed there 9 days in the past year, and have never found anything to be less than excellent.

Reviews.Title: “college and area search”
Reviews.Author: vinnie69
Reviews.Content: 2 minutes from airport entrance, very quiet for sleeping,

Reviews.Title: “WOW Beautiful Lodge”
Reviews.Author: Babydoll2000
Reviews.Content: Close to the lite rail to get downtown, they drive you there and airport also. The whole lodge is very beautiful, better than we expected, Classy Frank Lollyd wright design with modern japanese touches. Great selection of items for breakfast in a beautiful setting with high soaring ceilings and fireplaces. They have a 'living room' that is public 24/7 for free snacks like hagen daz ice cream, chocolates, drinks. A real treat when we came in late! Very cozy elegant atmosphere. My husband and I will always remember it.

Reviews.Title: “Cedarbrook Lodge is Seatac's Best Kept Secret”
Reviews.Author: Robbi10
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook Lodge is a lovely property located near the airport that looks and feels like you are miles away. The Copperleaf Restaurant is exceptional, the rooms are subtly appointed but with all the technology you need. The "living rooms" provide complimentary snacks 24 hrs a day; malt balls and Haagen Dazs! Complimentary breakfast is not your typical continental fare, which is good! Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Cedarbrook is a beautiful place and excellent quality.”
Reviews.Author: Maestromark
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Cedarbrook for a wedding - the reception was at Cedarbrook. The place is beautiful, the rooms very comfortable. Completely relaxing experience. They have large common rooms if you want to hang out outside your room - and int hem they have little snack food and bottles of water for the taking. A nice little perk. Cedarbrook is near SeaTac airport, but you don't hear plane noise - it is green and quiet. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible comination of location,setting, friendly and attentive service and wonderful accomodations”
Reviews.Author: GLI3
Reviews.Content: A mile or so from the airport but feels like a whole different world. Beautiful landscaping. Thew friendliest of staff. Beautiful rooms and commons areas. Best fitness center I have seen.Convenient shuttle to airport. Wonderful place to stay

Reviews.Title: “An incredible layover!”
Reviews.Author: flybyefl
Reviews.Content: Minutes from Sea-Tac but so far removed in atmosphere, this amazing lodge delivers impeccable service, accomodations, and amenities. Seemingly, every need is anticipated and provided for and every staff member has genuine concern for your comfort. A truly relaxing experience as a base for exploring the area, as a stop over when cruising or traveling West, or for business.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Wolfman1953
Reviews.Content: Staff was excellent and friendly. They asked to do everything for you. The included snacks were great and well appreciated on a late check-in, wi-fi and continental breakfast was a bit above average. The rooms were clean, seemed new and comfortable. Our travel companion posted "OMG, this place is awesome." One of the best places we've stayed.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: agent_330
Reviews.Content: This was a fantastic place to stay!! I would highly recommend Cedarbrook Lodge to anyone who wants a great nights sleep in a beautiful location. We have stayed in a lot of motels and Cedarbrook by far had the most comfortable bed. Slept great. Near the airport and we did not notice any noise from the airport. Beautiful Grounds with water falls and ponds. Hard to believe that it is so close to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience. Very Relaxing!!”
Reviews.Author: linlin88
Reviews.Content: This is a place that make you feel like home, or you wish your home is like Cedarbrook Lodge. What more can I say....... experience yourself and you'll feel the same!

Reviews.Title: “our last night of vacation”
Reviews.Author: maumeeastoria
Reviews.Content: We loved ending our vacation with such a comfortable stay. We enjoyed the outside spaces and walking trails at Cedarbrook Lodge. We also enjoyed being able to open our windows to the outside air and hearing the birds singing in the morning. It was amazing that we didn't hear airport noise at all - it was great.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Start to Our Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Blink810
Reviews.Content: We live quite a distance from the airport, and staying at Cedarbrook Lodge was less expensive than flying the commuter or taking a shuttle service. We'd been referred by my boss, and were not disappointed. It's hard to believe the airport is so close by; it's an oasis of calm. The service was first rate, the continental breakfast delicious and varied (not your typical fare), the room spacious and the beds comfortable. It's like a resort near the airport. Our only complaint was that it was nicer than the hotel we stayed in while on vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: gyocke
Reviews.Content: Unique, quiet and beautiful setting. Employees were kind and friendly and the gym was terrific. I stayed here by myself and next time I want to bring my husband here so he can understand why I'm raving about the place. I envision us just staying on the grounds the whole time and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Afraid this might get to popular”
Reviews.Author: 1Chukar
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough good about the facilities and staff at Cedarbrook. Through conversation I understand that management and people there are all relatively new as this was a private facility until recently. Anyway, we recently had our meeting (about 15) there and we were not organized at to what or needs and schedule might turn out to be. Everyone that we worked with, up to and including the new GM, rallied to us and were most cordial and accommodating to what some might say were outrageous requests. Just a few of us stayed overnight and wow, what a find. Easy, comfortable rooms that are quiet. And too a real workout facility with quality equipment.. Take it from me, this place is great and as my title says - my fear is that right now its a quiet find -and if service stays this way it won't stay quiet for long.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay at the Cedarbrook”
Reviews.Author: sruitto
Reviews.Content: Flew into SEA last Saturday night to meet my daughter and her infant son and assist them back to PHL Sunday morning. Needed a clean place to stay since the baby is only a few weeks old. Was met at the Cedarbrook with open arms. Hotel was very clean and pleasant. Room service was quick and the free snacks are a real treat. Departed too early for the free breakfast. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is an absolute must”
Reviews.Author: gmunkie
Reviews.Content: Like the rest of the reviews posted, I have to echo the positives. Serene environment; can't hear the planes when inside the rooms. Complimentary bottled water, snacks, ice cream, and continental breakfast were all bonuses; quality was excellent. Property in & out was exceptionally clean & well cared for. Complimentary business center meant I did not have to bring a laptop. This was my first stay, and I will now always stay at this property. Great value.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel had lots of little things that made it special.”
Reviews.Author: RockMontana
Reviews.Content: This hotel had great service, very comfortable beds, large tub and shower, and very friendly staff. One of the best parts of it is the free snacks and water in the living room area. We could also use that refrigerator to put things in. Everything about Cedarbrook Lodge is first class.

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret in the Seattle Tacoma Area!”
Reviews.Author: Keisu
Reviews.Content: Close to airport, yet you do not hear the sounds of traffic or aircraft. Relaxing, beautiful natural atmosphere that allows you to attend your meetings feeling wonderful and well taken care of. The rooms are designed with clean, comforting lines and furniture you do not want to get up from. Soak in the wonderful, deep tub with the bath salts and you will drop quickly off to sleep when your head hits the pillow. Food is healthy menu with fish and meat, variety of salads, starch and fresh vegetables at every meal. Desserts were awesome. Who knew this lovely place was so close to everything - easy access to freeway, return to the airport, other restaurants. Great grounds easy for walking for anyone and the friendliest, helpful staff you could ask for.

Reviews.Title: “I love Cedarbrook Lodge!”
Reviews.Author: Love2Travel543
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Cedarbrook lodge for 3 nights for work. I loved everything about it. The rooms were very clean, very comfortable bed, nice bathrooms, and every meal was great! (breakfast, lunch, & dinner!) The best part was the atmosphere. There were beautiful trees and pond features on the property. I loved the outside fireplace and all the indoor fireplaces. Very warm and cozy. The fitness center was great too! The "living rooms" were great, it was nice to sit by the fireplace and have some free icecream and malt balls. Also the customer service at the bars, dinner rooms, and front desk were wonderful. The best was a bartender named Pete. Very friendly and fun to talk to. I hope work sends me here again, it was a great stay! If you are needing to be near the Seattle airport, this is the best place. I'm not sure if I'd stay here if I was wanting to spend my time in Seattle due to commute. Regardless, I loved this place!!

Reviews.Title: “You will love this lodge!”
Reviews.Author: johnc88
Reviews.Content: The lodge is close to the airport, but you won't know it. It is quiet, beautiful inside and out. clean and comfortable. We are going back for another night at the end of our vacation and we can't wait to get back. The staff is attentive and very pleasant. Go as soon as you can, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: “A gem in the city”
Reviews.Author: Mexicodreaming1
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful property. Close to the airport but the feeling is that you are at a remote location. The service is wonderful. Comfortable beds and the snacks are a great touch. The morning breakfast is a delight.

Reviews.Title: “great location convienient and good breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: pastorde
Reviews.Content: I will stay @ Cedarbrook Lodge again on my return visit

Reviews.Title: “Seattle's Best Kept Secret”
Reviews.Author: MsW-L
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I spent the weekend at the Cedarbrook Lodge. We wish we could have stayed longer. The entire staff was friendly and helpful. It was a retreat setting blocks from the airport. Quiet ponds with mallards floating peacefully, waterfalls, flowering cherry trees, magnolias in full bloom. Plenty of storage and workspace in the room. Great breakfast. Free snacks. Free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden gem near the airport”
Reviews.Author: CherO50
Reviews.Content: Although the Lodge is near the airport you feel as if you are far away in a wooded sanctuary. Very calm and peaceful ambiance with beautiful grounds and gardens, and cozy fireplaces in common areas create a comfortable, relaxing feel. The lounge area is the perfect spot for a late evening glass of wine on the sofa by the large fireplace. The complimentary breakfast was fabulous as well as the treats in common areas of Haagen Daz, yogurt, string cheese, fruit and jars of malt balls and yogurt pretzels. We will definitely be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Resort-like hotel very near SeaTac Airport”
Reviews.Author: Maplewest
Reviews.Content: Well maintained property with a "resort-like" feel in an urban forested area. A hotel that does not look like a hotel when you arrive. Rooms have a "designer" interior and furnishings, very comfortable and very clean. Near Sea-Tac airport but did not notice any sound from aircraft. Convenient shuttle to and from nearby light-rail transit station made for an easy trip to downtown Seattle. Free snacks and breakfast include some unique but very wholesome items. The breakfast area is situated in a beautiful "lodge" building with cedar decor. Staff are very friendly and accommodating. Hotel is easily accessible from I-5 (without hearing traffic noise) and quality shopping malls are nearby. The lack of a pool and hot tub is more than compensated by the overall quality of this place. We spent four nights at the facility and highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Stayed her 3 times...location, service, stay ...all A+”
Reviews.Author: EricGone
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here 3 times and will again next week. The location can't be beat for business meetings, 3 minutes from baggage claim at Sea-Tac YET it is totally hidden away in a quiet neighborhood off the main drag. This is resort living at normal price. Complimentary treats Yoghurt, ice-cream, fruit, candy. 1 problem quickly resolved (heater was not working upon checking in, 2 staff helped me pack up and move next door in 2 minutes. Romantic getaway - they brought the champagne bucket and candles complimentary...Try it...You'll Like It!

Reviews.Title: “Totally exceeded our Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: dhawkes
Reviews.Content: We just needed a place to sleep before catching an early morning flight but the Cedarbrook Lodge had us so impressed we wished we could stay longer! Ultra friendly service, beautiful grounds and super comfortable rooms just made the night fantastic. Icing on the cake was complimentary snacks/drinks in the common room! Who doesn't like Haagen Dazs ice cream? We will definitley be back.

Reviews.Title: “Free Ice Cream, 'Nuff Said.”
Reviews.Author: orion938
Reviews.Content: I booked a room at Cedarbrook because I was wrapping up a trip around the Northwest and wanted a hotel for the night that was close to the airport for my early morning flight. I originally intended to stay at one of the regular chain hotels but I noticed on hotels.com that Cedarbrook had a 100% guest recommendation rating out of nearly 300 reviews. So, I went for it. When I checked in, I felt like I was stepping into a cozy yet refined mountain lodge. The gentleman at the desk was extremely gracious and, to my delight, informed me there was complimentary ice cream, bottled water, yogurt, fresh fruit, and other snacks in the lounge near my room (which also featured a lit fireplace, books, and comfy chairs). And the room itself? Very comfortable and modern (but still cozy) with tons of storage space. If you like free Hagaan Dazs, friendly service, and a cozy room, stay at Cedarbrook!

Reviews.Title: “An oasis of calm and service in the heart of the airport area.”
Reviews.Author: Wiimaster
Reviews.Content: Stellar service, comfortable, casual and modern atmosphere with high quality bedding and quiet peaceful surroundings make for a great visit business or pleasure. Convenient location just off the highway and very close to the airport but no noise. Fantastic food in the restaurant for dinner much of it local and organic, and very reasonably priced, especially the wine. Breakfast was also excellent if even a bit small. Ample parking, pretty grounds and genuinely friendly and helpful staff across the board. Have not had this level of service since a 4 seasons and at a fraction of the price. Strongest recommendation and will stay there again anytime in the Seattle area if you don't need to be downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Seatac area”
Reviews.Author: fr8woman
Reviews.Content: Service was great, room price was very reasonable, especially considering the amenities. Located close to Seatac, yet you feel like you are in a remote loaction.

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret at Sea-TAc”
Reviews.Author: marciajo
Reviews.Content: For travelers spending the night at Sea-Tac prior to an early morning flight, this is simply the best. Everything is beautiful - the rooms, the staff, the food, the grounds. From your northwest lodge, you are within viewing distance of the airport, yet set in acres of wetlands and nature. Nothing is smokey, tacky, or mildewy. The staff is happy. engaging and helpful. I cannot say enough about Cedarbrook, and I hope that enough people will support it so that it may thrive into the future.. -Marcia Spees, Eastsound, WA; Dec. 20,2009

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly comfortable and charming with world's best service”
Reviews.Author: Art_travel50
Reviews.Content: I will start with a "caveat" that I arrived quite bedraggled after a difficult day of travel, and was upset, when checking in, to learn that I had to get back in the car and drive to some parking lot somewhere in the pouring rain. (This is due to the fact that the hotel is made up of separate lodges). I was so exhausted and unable to take one more frustration that I had a "meltdown" at the desk and this is where I first learned how fabulous this hotel's service is: they insisted on accompanying me out to the parking lot, and staying with me until I got settled into the room. They could not have been more solicitous even though I was beyond "cranky." Although the restaurant was closed, they were able to rustle up a fantastic dinner in a beautiful room with a fireplace, and next morning the excellent service continued in the form of a most wonderful breakfast buffet. I've only been commenting on the service here, so let me also point out the comfort and beautiful furnishings of the room. Also, each of the lodges that makes up the hotel has a lovely sitting room with snacks, books, etc. It could not have been more comfortable and charming. Every aspect of the place deserves a "5+."

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: travels49
Reviews.Content: Tranquil surroundings. Great rooms for reading and lounging. Great snacks! Fitness center was wonderful, not at all like a typical hotel's fitness center. This is a great place to get away for a weekend of quiet and reflection.

Reviews.Title: “An outstanding option for the business traveler”
Reviews.Author: sassy340
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but praise for the Cedarbrook! The facility is beautiful both inside and out, very relaxing - shockingly so, considering its proximity to the airport - and provides great food and drinks. Personally, I prefer downtown Seattle for a leisure trip, but if you're traveling on business and/or have a car this is a wonderful option.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: pistol1997
Reviews.Content: The Cedarbrook Conference Center was absolutely fantastic, the staff was extremely courteous, the room and food was excellent. What really impressed me was that the rooms had spa tubs, and complementary robes. The grounds where beautiful, and if it was warmer I would have gone outside to enjoy the surroundings. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel and surroungings”
Reviews.Author: MdTraveler88
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel! The grounds are so pretty that they are used for weddings. You could tell that the property was well maintained. They provided a free shuttle from the SeaTac hotel and also volunteered to drive us to the monorail (about 10 min. away) so we could go to downtown Seattle. Also, the free buffet breakfast was outstanding. I hope we get the opportunity to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “A walk in the woods”
Reviews.Author: NaKoa
Reviews.Content: After a late flight and later check-in, we awoke to an amazing view of cedar trees outside our floor to ceiling windows. We felt like we were literally in the middle of a forest, although we were all of 5 minutes from SeaTac Airport. If you like peace and quiet, this is the place for you. Previous reviewers told me what to expect, but I was surprised by the simple beauty of the hotel. The property surrounds a open beamed central building that houses meeting rooms, a soaring two story fireplace in the lobby, a side room with a pool table and bar and an onsite restaurant. Covered walkways lead you a few steps to side buildings holding the guest rooms. All rooms face either the wetlands or an interior view of beautifully landscaped trees, bushes and the occasional squirrel. The rooms are modern, glass, wood and chrome themed. Clean and obviously well cared for. The rooms are so quiet you are barely aware of other guests. A central lounge in each of the buildings holds a fireplace, tv, small library and a refrigerator stocked with all the free bottled water, yogurt, ice cream and string cheese you can drag to your room. Apothecary jars on a counter also hold pretzels, malt balls, chips, etc. Nice. A huge exercise room had every apparatus known from treadmills to ellipticals to free weights and squat racks. One of the nicer properties we've been to.

HotelInfo.Name: Cedarbrook Lodge
HotelInfo.Address: 18525 36th Avenue South, Seattle, WA 98188-4967
